DOC.brief_summary: This study will evaluate the effects of anacetrapib on low-density lipoprotein-cholesterol (LDL-C) and high-density lipoprotein cholesterol (HDL-C) in participants with hypercholesterolemia when added to an existing statin therapy.
DOC.brief_title: A Study of the Safety and Efficacy of Anacetrapib (MK-0859) Among Participants With Hypercholesterolemia When Added to Ongoing Statin Therapy (MK-0859-022)
